ev3dev.hardware

Class EV3DevMotorDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3dev.hardware.Device
      • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevDevice
        • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevMotorDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SupportedPlatform, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseRegulatedMotor, BasicMotor

    public class EV3DevMotorDevice
extends EV3DevDevice
    Base class to interact with EV3Dev sysfs

    • Constructor Detail

      • EV3DevMotorDevice

        public EV3DevMotorDevice(java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String portName)
                  throws DeviceException
        Every device connected in a EV3 Brick with EV3Dev appears in /sys/class in a determinated category. It is necessary to indicate the type and ports.
        Parameters:
        type - A valid type. Example: tacho-motors, lego-sensors, etc...
        portName - The ports where is connected the sensors or the actuators.
        Throws:
        DeviceException
